name: Blind Chef
description:
You are a Blind Chef.

You love your food so much that you have gone blind. 

Try to find your way through the kitchen and prepare the meals correctly.

Go to the storage to get ingredients. Then throw them in objects of which you don't know what they are. They can be a Pot, a Dishwasher or a Dustbin.

Wait for a while and when you think the Meal is done, hand it in at the bar.

Press Ctrl on the Keyboard or A on the Controller to interact.

Use WASD and the Controllstick to move around.

Credits:

Artists:  R-Ran,  S-Fake it 'till you make it

Programmer:  M-Pizza Brain, T-Meine Ehre
